pr_title: [FLINK-16694][ci] Limit number of dumped log lines

timeline.bodyText: Can we add here that only a part of the log files are printed and that one should access the log files for a proper analysis?
timeline.author: tillrohrmann
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -366,7 +366,7 @@ function check_logs_for_errors {
       | grep -ic "error" || true)
   if [[ ${error_count} -gt 0 ]]; then
     echo "Found error in log files:"

timeline.message: [FLINK-16694][ci] Limit number of dumped log lines
